co.paralleluniverse.common.io

Class Streamables

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.paralleluniverse.common.io.Streamables

  • public final class Streamables
extends Object
    Provides utility methods for working with Streamables and/or data streams.

      Streamables()

    • Method Detail

      • toByteArray

        public static byte[] toByteArray(Streamable streamable)
        Serializes a Streamable into a byte array.
        Parameters:
        streamable - The object to serialize.
        Returns:
        A byte array containing the serialized object.

      • fromByteArray

        public static void fromByteArray(Streamable streamable,
                 byte[] array)
        Reads a Streamable's serialized contents from a byte array. The serialized form begins in the beginning of the array and extends to the end of the array.

        Same as calling fromByteArray(streamable, array, 0, array.length).

        Parameters:
        streamable - The object whose contents are to be read.
        array - The array from which to read the serialized form.

      • fromByteArray

        public static void fromByteArray(Streamable streamable,
                 byte[] array,
                 int offset)
        Reads a Streamable's serialized contents from a byte array. The serialized form begins in the given offset and extends to the end of the array.

        Same as calling fromByteArray(streamable, array, offset, array.length - offset).

        Parameters:
        streamable - The object whose contents are to be read.
        array - The array from which to read the serialized form.
        offset - The offset into the array from which to start reading the serialized form.

      • fromByteArray

        public static void fromByteArray(Streamable streamable,
                 byte[] array,
                 int offset,
                 int length)
        Reads a Streamable's serialized contents from a byte array.
        Parameters:
        streamable - The object whose contents are to be read.
        array - The array from which to read the serialized form.
        offset - The offset into the array from which to start reading the serialized form.
        length - The length of the serialized form to read from the array.

      • writeBuffer

        public static void writeBuffer(DataOutput out,
               ByteBuffer buffer)
                        throws IOException
        Writes the given ByteBuffer into the given DataOutput.
        Parameters:
        out - The DataOutput into which the buffer will be written.
        buffer - The buffer to write into the DataOutput.
        Throws:
        IOException

        public static int calcUtfLength(String str)
        Returns the length in bytes of a string's UTF-8 encoding.
        Parameters:
        str - The string to measure.
        Returns:
        The length in bytes of a string's UTF-8 encoding.
